divs: sighting detailsthis is being submitted\investigated by jim s. (mufon fi id 12701) approximately in 1982, i and three other acquaintances were fishing on my boat in the middle of portage lake, when we saw a large star-like object. we joked that it could be a ufo and at that point, the ufo descended rapidly and hovered right over us. it was so close, that i observed figures in the windows. the next thing we knew is that we were standing on the beach with the boat on\near the shoreline. since 1982, i have had an extremely strong sense or fear of ever saying anything about this incident to anyone.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Akron
There were no other sightings in Akron on or around June 1st 1982
Summary: UFO descended and hovered over our boat on Portage Lake
